EmailTemplate.name: 20March14- Thought Leadership.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, webinar on thought leadership
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us on Thursday, March 20 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a webinar titled "Take Charge of Your Vertical: How to Be a Thought Leader <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/take-charge-your-vertical-how-be-thought-leader>."
Being recognized as an industry expert is vital for independent consultants that market themselves online. Have you considered how you can solidify your position as the authority on your subject matter? MBO Partners is welcoming author and CEO of Thought Leadership Lab Denise Brosseau to our webinar series. Denise will walk you through case studies, tips and techniques you can use to make your consultancy more visible in the Google era. Register today <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/take-charge-your-vertical-how-be-thought-leader>! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
